name: Catch the Pizza
description:
In this game you play the role of Julian, who ordered some slices of pizza, so you must take the pizzas but be careful, since hot dogs are not part of your diet; You also have to consider Leonardo, the glutton, since he loves pizza and try to attract as much as possible before it arrives.

The theme I chose was gluttony.

Due to time constraints, it still does not have sound, although the executable is already functional for Windows, Linux, Mac, Webgl and Android, the graphics are available for Android and then new larger images are added for the other devices.

Note: this is the first time I participate in an event like this, so I would appreciate comments to improve.
